baseline_groups.claim_summary: Relative skill efficiency (AQ) is positively associated with GDP per worker across countries
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=1.41, p=0.005. Cross-sectional OLS with 12 countries. Elasticity of log(AQ) wrt log(GDP).

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Relative human capital quality (Q) is positively associated with GDP per worker using US immigrant data
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=0.105, p<0.001. Much larger sample using immigrant wage data.

global_notes: Cross-sectional study of human capital and skill efficiency across countries. Two main analyses: AQ (12-country micro sample) and Q (US immigrant data). 67 specs. AQ analysis has small N=12 but Q analysis is well-powered.
